original_file: string, the file path or name

product_identity.product_type: string, e.g. three-phase hybrid solar inverter, battery-ready
models: list of model names covered in the datasheet

main_application.use_cases: string, e.g. residential/small commercial PV system
compatible_battery_systems: list of compatible battery systems, with type and capacity range
main_application.backup_power_support: string, describe if and how backup power is supported

ac_grid_output.backup_output_ratings: voltage, frequency, and power for backup output if present

battery_interface.compatible_battery_type: e.g. high-voltage lithium battery, brand/system name

dc_protection: e.g. reverse polarity, DC switch, AFCI
monitoring_of_faults: e.g. insulation, ground fault, string fault monitoring

interfaces: e.g. USB, RS485, WiFi, GPRS, LAN, RF, with which are optional

safety_and_others: list of safety or EMC standards

key_marketing_features: short bullet list of highlighted features from cover page or main feature section
